title.rendered: Business You can Start With Little Or No Capital

content.rendered:
You may not know but there are businesses that you can do if you had nothing or little.

I am going to talk about it here. If you have money you can do it and if you don’t you can still do it.  The business is scrap or waste business.

If you have the money then you can buy scrap and resell it to wholesalers or even sell tonnes of it to companies that will recycle it

But if you don’t, then you will start low as a scavenger. You pick on the streets or go to refuse dump and pick valuable spoilt thrown away waste and sell it

Things That You Can Pick And Sell.

Businesses You Can Start With Little or no Capital

• Waste Cartons
• Waste Iron- Zinc, nails, things made of  Iron of any type
• Waste Paper.
• Copper Wire and Things made of Copper.
• Aluminum Zinc and tins and wire and things made of Aluminum.
• Waste Plastics.
• Waste nylon.so on
•Waste  paper and
